title: Bobotie
description: Bobotie is a kind of fruity, herby meatloaf with a curried custard topping, of Cape Malay origin. Sounds odd but tastes great! All southern Africans have their own recipe for this; ours is a classical recipe but with a heap of local advice thrown in.
ingredients: a thumbnail-sized piece of tamarind pod
3kg/6½lb best beef mince (for best results, get good rump steak and mince it yourself)
a thumb-sized piece of fresh ginger, finely chopped
a few sprigs of marjoram, leaves only
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
